name: Soup Boy goes to the Soup Convention
name_original: Soup Boy goes to the Soup Convention
description:
The Soup Convention is in town. Can you win the soup eating contest?

Can be controlled with mouse (Left click to move/interact/advance text, right click to  open menu and cancel) or keyboard (arrow keys to move, space to interact and accept, x to open menu and cancel)

Game made in under 48 hours for MS Paint Jam 2021 featuring some sprites by glacé.

Walking simulator. Only a couple minutes long. Two endings, though there's not much variation between the two.

This game uses the MV3D plugin by cutievirus
